de.engehausen.treemap.examples

Class FileModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.engehausen.treemap.impl.GenericTreeModel<FileInfo>
      • de.engehausen.treemap.examples.FileModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITreeModel<FileInfo>, IWeightedTreeModel<FileInfo>

    public class FileModel
extends GenericTreeModel<FileInfo>
    A weighted tree model of files and directories. The model can be built from a given starting point and will recursive into all sub-directories.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IWeightedTreeModel<FileInfo> createFileModel(java.lang.String rootDir)
      Creates a file model starting at the given "root" directory.

      • Methods inherited from class de.engehausen.treemap.impl.GenericTreeModel

        add, add, getChildren, getParent, getRoot, getWeight, hasChildren

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • createFileModel

        public static IWeightedTreeModel<FileInfo> createFileModel(java.lang.String rootDir)
        Creates a file model starting at the given "root" directory.
        Parameters:
        rootDir - the starting directory for building the model, must not be null and must be a valid directory.
        Returns:
        a file model starting at the given "root" directory.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the root directory is not valid.
